hospitalsWithAppointmentsSubtitle.en: We have confirmed that these hospitals have appointments available.
hospitalsWithAppointmentsSubtitle.zh: 我們已確認該醫院有自費疫苗接種名額

hospitalsWithNoDataSubtitle.en: We don't know if these hospitals have appointments. Please check their website.
hospitalsWithNoDataSubtitle.zh: 我們無法確認該醫院的自費疫苗接種名額。請查看醫院的官網。

hospitalsWithNoAppointmentsSubtitle.en: These hospitals have no appointments. Please check again later.
hospitalsWithNoAppointmentsSubtitle.zh: 這些醫院沒有自費疫苗接種名額。請稍後在查詢本網站
